summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Season Tracker PWA with backend APIs, frontend UI, and integration testing. All 23 test cases passed successfully (8 backend + 15 frontend).
passed_tests: Backend health check endpoint returns healthy status
Season endpoint returns winter with 56.8% progress for north hemisphere
Season endpoint returns summer (opposite) for south hemisphere
All seasons endpoint returns array of 4 seasons correctly
Notification preferences POST/GET endpoints save/retrieve from MongoDB
Affirmation endpoint returns appropriate seasonal messages
Home page displays Winter title and 57% progress ring
Stats row shows correct values (50 days in, 38 left, 88 total)
Affirmation card displays text with working refresh functionality
Season timeline shows all 4 seasons with Winter highlighted
Bottom navigation works with 3 tabs (Home, Seasons, Settings)
Seasons page shows all season cards with Winter having 'Now' badge
Settings page has functional hemisphere toggle and notification settings
Hemisphere switching updates season data correctly (North Winter â†’ South Summer)
Mobile responsive design works at 390px width
Season particle animations present in DOM (15 particles detected)
